items.title: Discord says hackers stole government IDs of 70,000 users

ai_summary: Discord stated hackers accessed and stole government identification documents of users.
Approximately seventy thousand user accounts were affected by the data breach.
The company is investigating the incident and notifying impacted individuals.
Discord is working with law enforcement to address the security breach.
Stolen information could potentially be used for identity theft or fraud.

These screens can display solving steps and other interactive information.
The cube connects to a mobile application for additional features and data.
The device aims to enhance the solving experience for enthusiasts.
